About Documentation

SMPP REST API

Welcome to the SMPP REST API GitHub page. If you would like to contribute, please fork the GitHub project and open a pull request when you're done. If you have any issues or bugs to report or think that this project is missing something, please use the GitHub issue tracker. Huge credit goes to the CloudHopper SMPP project; kudos to Twitter for their open source efforts. Enjoy.
